Introduction
This topic contains information about taking rating action on the results of review examinations and cancellations, including rating action on review examination
results
showing worsening symptomatology
, and
demonstrating development of additional residual or secondary disabilities
, and
cancellations
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Rating Action on Review Examination Results and Cancellations
citation: Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
